location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Thomas Hodges, President and Governor at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter reports George Skipp's return from Schiras [Shiraz] and his advice that there is no need to withdraw from Bushire. Also reported is that Zackey Caun [Zaki Khan] is camped at Genover [Bandar-e-Ganaveh] with 3000 troops but no order to move against Carrack [Kharg] has been given and that Dr Birch is desperately short of medicines and requests that more be sent.
